object.name: change_state
object.property: python:checkPermission("Modify portal content", object) or checkPermission("Review portal content", object)

object.name: cut
object.property: python:checkPermission("Delete objects", globals_view.getParentObject()) and checkPermission("Copy or Move", object) and not globals_view.isPortalOrPortalDefaultPage()

object.name: copy
object.property: python:checkPermission("Copy or Move", object) and not globals_view.isPortalOrPortalDefaultPage()

element.value: opengever.workspace: Delete Workspace Meeting Agenda Items

object.name: cut
object.property: python:checkPermission("Delete objects", globals_view.getParentObject()) and checkPermission("Copy or Move", object) and not globals_view.isPortalOrPortalDefaultPage()

object.name: move_item
object.property: python:(object.restrictedTraverse('@@plone_interface_info').provides('opengever.document.behaviors.IBaseDocument') and object.is_movable() and not object.is_checked_out()) or (object.restrictedTraverse('@@plone_interface_info').provides('opengever.task.task.ITask') and not object.restrictedTraverse('@@plone_interface_info').provides('opengever.inbox.forwarding.IForwarding'))

object.name: copy
object.property: python:checkPermission("Copy or Move", object) and not globals_view.isPortalOrPortalDefaultPage()

object.name: rename
object.property: python:checkPermission("Delete objects", globals_view.getParentObject()) and checkPermission("Copy or Move", object) and checkPermission("Add portal content", object) and not globals_view.isPortalOrPortalDefaultPage()
